channel.title: Docker on Anton Sizikov
channel.description: Recent content in Docker on Anton Sizikov

item.title: Docker image tests
item.description: Today we’re going to set up a CI/CD GitHub Action with a Container Structure Test step which will help us to enforce the certain quality policies for the images which we build and ship.

item.title: Fix console logs for Azure Functions running in a Docker container
item.description: Local development of C# Azure Functions on macOS is still a bit painful. Even the simple-ish logging might cause issues. Let’s assume that we have Azure Functions Core Tools installed and we have a basic function app with one TimerTrigger function created.
